title: error during champion selection
body:
when i get to champion selecition.Ranked or blind pick.Every second time i get messege *there was a problem whit your champion selection*.And then i get  messege that i left game during champion selection.Its happend even whe i pick champion to bann .Blind pick is  kind of OK.But i just lost qualification game cuz u get this same messege,then dropped from the game and ''you left during champion selection''
What could be the problem ?champions that i pick was not banned.And why i get the same problem when i wanna bann champion ?

replies.body: That's frustrating and I don't recommend queueing up until we get this fixed up.  There are a few factors that could cause this like third party apps getting in the way or a network losing sync and kicking you off.  Especially if on wifi!  Close out anything that you may have interacting with league, and see if a[ power cycle ](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic)might help.  Test it out in a custom game, though!

well i had power down yesterday for 1 hour so i suppose all this power cycle is done since there was no power in the whole house.And the problem still exist.I had this for more then 1 month :( .Only thing thats working same time whit LOL is my antivirus program,but its on a silent mod(avast).And i dont get problem whit connection during game at all,or laggs or any other kind of problems.

Actually problem exist since i start playing again,2 months ago.



edit : and BTW  i won my second game.And ofc dropped during my third game and lost qualification...
